allow: Bash(gh api repos/:owner/:repo/pulls/$(gh pr view --json number --jq .number)/comments:*)

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); branch=$(cd "$project" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m [\033[33m%s\033[0m] \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch" "$style"
